decisions.description: Did submitter select an Existing Item?
decisions.name: Existing_Item
decisions.label: Existing Item?

decisions.description: Determine object type of passed-in recordId (if applicable)
decisions.name: Object_Type_from_recordId
decisions.label: Object Type from recordId

decisions.description: If Sourcing WO anything other than Completed, route to screen for error handling (only Completed Sourcing WOs can be used to create Single NIR)
decisions.name: Status_of_Sourcing_WO
decisions.label: Status of Sourcing WO

Flow.description: Screen Flow to submit an NIR

formulas.description:
Direct NIR do not require Sourcing approval, with the exception of the following product categories:
Packaging: Ancillary Packaging > Lumber / Plywood, Pallets Corrugated Equipment / Parts Folding Carton Mailers > Corrugated Mailers Surface Protection > Chipboard, Edge Protection, Masking Paper, Packaging Papers
Print: All Print
formulas.name: frm_DirectNotException
formulas.expression: {!cmp_Item_Delivery_Type} = "Direct" && NOT( {!cmp_SegmentProdCategory.topValue} = "Packaging" && IF( CASE({!cmp_SegmentProdCategory.middleValue}, "Ancillary Packaging", CASE({!cmp_SegmentProdCategory.bottomValue}, "Lumber / Plywood", 1, "Pallets", 1, 0), "Corrugated", 1, "Mailers", CASE({!cmp_SegmentProdCategory.bottomValue}, "Corrugated Mailers", 1, 0), "Surface Protection", CASE({!cmp_SegmentProdCategory.bottomValue}, "Chipboard", 1, "Edge Protection", 1, "Masking Paper", 1, "Packaging Papers", 1, 0), 0) = 1, TRUE, FALSE)) && NOT({!cmp_SegmentProdCategory.topValue} = "Print")

formulas.description: If an Existing Item was selected, use that Description; otherwise use the Item Description component value
formulas.name: frm_ItemDescription

formulas.description: Mark as auto-approved if 1) NIR originates from a completed Sourcing Work Order or 2) NIR is Direct (and not Corrugated, Folding Carton, or Packaging Equipment)
formulas.name: frm_SourcingAutoApproved
frm_SourcingComments
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT({!Get_Sourcing_Work_Order.Status}) = "Completed", "Auto-approved as NIR was submitted from completed Sourcing work order", IF({!frm_DirectNotException}, "Auto-approved as Direct NIR do not require Sourcing approval",null))

formulas.description: If originated from a Sourcing WO, Sourcing Status is automatically Approved
formulas.name: frm_SourcingStatus

formulas.description: Show fields related to Stocking items
formulas.name: frm_stockingFieldsVisible

Flow.label: Work Order - [SF] NIR

fields.name: cmp_IncompleteSourcingWOMessage
fields.fieldText:
** Incomplete Sourcing Work Order **


Only completed Sourcing Work Orders can be used to submit a Single New Item Request. Please wait until the Sourcing Work Order is complete and try again.


Work Order #: {!Get_Sourcing_Work_Order.WorkOrderNumber}

Status: {!Get_Sourcing_Work_Order.Status}

Owner: {!frm_SourcingWorkOrderOwnerName}

fields.name: cmp_Existing_Item
fields.fieldText: Is this for an existing item?

validationRule.errorMessage: Product Type must be 255 characters or less.
Color field must be 15 characters or less
Size field must be 20 characters or less
Vendor Name must be less than 255 characters.
Vendor Rep Name must be 50 characters or less

fields.name: How_does_it_get_to_them
fields.fieldText: How does it get to them?

fields.name: cmp_CDIAgreementNotice
fields.fieldText: Please attach copy of CDI Agreement below.

fields.name: cmp_ConsignmentAgreementNotice
fields.fieldText: Please attach copy of Agreement below.

fields.name: cmp_SustainabilityNote
fields.fieldText: If the item contains any elements of sustainability, please include them in comments below.

validationRule.errorMessage: Submitter Comments must be less than 2000 characters

fields.name: cmp_AttachmentWarning
fields.fieldText: ** If a quote is not attached below, it may delay your NIR. **

value.stringValue: Attach any relevant files (Quotes, Drawings, etc.)

fields.name: cmp_ConfirmationText
fields.fieldText: Your Single New Item Request #{!var_WorkOrderNumber} has been created. Click 'Finish' to close this window.
